original_text: “This is the law of the temple: All the surrounding area on top of the mountain will be most holy. Such is the law of the temple.
korean_text: 성전의 법은 이러하니라 산 꼭대기 지점의 주위는 지극히 거룩하리라 성전의 법은 이러하니라

sentences.original_text: This is the law of the temple
All the surrounding area on top of the mountain
Such is the law of the temple
